step1.title: Discover a Community
step1.description: Connect with students at your school and other universities to follow interesting content, build your network, and launch campus activities and projects.

step2.title: Explore Similar Interests
step2.description: Follow your #interests to find out what your peers are thinking and doing about the topics you care about most.

step3.title: Share Your Passion
step3.description: Make posts to share your ideas about any topic, and #tag it so that your community can join in the conversation.

step4.title: Built on Trust
step4.description: TWIC is a secure environment. All of your data on TWIC is encrypted, and none of your data is stored, shared, or sold to anyone.
